 * modulus.cpp
 *
 *  Created on: 25-Feb-2014
 *      Author: Anoosh
 */

#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>

using namespace std;

int main() {

	char string[200];
	memset(string, 0, sizeof(string));

	cin >> string;

	int i = 0;
	while(string[i]) {
		string[i] -= 7;
		i++;
	}

	cout << string << endl;

	return 0;
}
